name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Results-driven .NET / .NET Core Developer with 9+ years of experience in building robust applications using **.NET**, **.NET Core**, and **microservices architecture**. Proficient in developing **RESTful APIs**, designing scalable **SQL databases**, and implementing CI/CD pipelines to ensure reliable software delivery on **Azure**. Strong skills in **Git** for version control and containerization with **Docker** and **Kubernetes**. Hands-on experience with messaging systems like **RabbitMQ** and **Kafka**. Demonstrated ability to lead agile development processes and collaborate effectively across teams to deliver high-quality software solutions.
